resources.string:
2013.08.26
 · Corrected language check for Talking Compass
 · Fall back to other map if selected map is not available any more
 · Have new list active after list creation
 · Settings in light skin on Android 2.3 are visible again
 · Other small bug fixes
 
 
 2013.08.24
 New Features:
 · Talking compass (select "Start talking" while compass is active)
 · New menu structure for c:geo settings
 · Implementation of OKAPI interface for opencaching.de
 Support of live map, nearby search and online logging
 · Support uploading and merging of personal note to gc.com
 · Improved input method for editing personal note
 · Toggle hiding of own or found caches directly from live map (map settings)
 · Removed help function integration as it is no longer maintained by the author
 You can still access it online. Link in "About c:geo"
 · Added "Pocket Query Creator" to the list of useful apps
 · Suport importing PQs created by "Pocket Query Creator"
 · Detect if no internet connection is available when trying to download caches
 · Added image scaling for log images to be uploaded
 · Support hyperlinks in existing logbook entries
 · New filter on nearby results to filter out stored caches
 · Convert coordinates to different formats by clicking on them also for waypoints
 · Use "Today" and "Yesterday" as date for logbook entries
 · Support smilies also for trackable logs
 · Starting Bike navigation for Google navigation added
 · Support importing LOC files from waymarking.com
 · Added Slovenian translation
 · Support reloading the reCAPTCHA (basic members)
 · Field note export "since last export" now uses the last export date from c:geo instead of the gc.com feature
 · Show event date in search results
 · Added filter for several distance ranges
 · Added a tab viewer for "About c:geo"
 · Enabled fast scrolling for cache lists
 
 Bugfixes:
 · Adaption to changes on gc.com
 · Improved filtering of found caches on live map
 · Do not truncate the date in logbook entries
 · Enable GPX import option also on virtual all caches list
 · Support GeoTour attribute
 · Support of Block Party cache type
 · Support of GPS Adventure Exhibit cache type
 · Circles on the map only for physical stages
 · Overlay icons on map sized correctly on highres displays
 · Cache archived status not correctly refreshed
 · Bad title shown when invoking c:geo from email (import operation)
 · Avoid crash when log images is too large
 · Save cache before allowing to add or edit a personal note
 · Automatically use log type "Attended" if the date of an event cache is in the past
 · Use log type "Note" for event caches if they are already logged as "Attended"
 · Avoid to accidentally set the log type to "Needs archived" while loading the log page is still in progress
 · Ignore hiding of owned caches when explicitly searching for owned caches
 · Do not allow to select ".." as valid source directory for files
 · Exclude inaccessible directories from selection list
 · Do not show the short description of an oc.de cache if it is identical to the long description
 · Sorting of lists by cache name did not respect country specific characters
 · Avoid crash when deleting all caches including the list
 · Logging progress message keeps showing when tapping on the screen
 · Try to additionally detect the waypoint type when reading out coordinates from the personal note
 · Show the image uploaded with a log in the logbook without the need to refresh the cache before
 · Improvements to GPX import and export
 · Ask for list to save caches when importing GPX
 · Show basic Geokrety information for OC caches
 · Improved the map source selection for offline maps
 · Avoid crashes when using the QR code scanner
 · List sorting kept when returning from cache details
 · Corrected list sorting if cache name contains numbers
 · Set the default "waypoint shown on live map" limit to 10 as many users did not recognize this feature
 · Fixed GPX import problem if geocode starts with numbers
 · Fixed missing information in listing if mobile network uses a performance proxy
 · Avoid jumping trail on live map if there is no GPS fix
 · Workaround for fluctuating distances (android bug) with some Android 4.2.1 devices
 
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
 · Other:
 On devices with HD display resolution OSM maps might not work. Please use Google maps in this case.
 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
